knimeNode.name: Distance (n-D)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node calculates the distance between two points in n-D space

intro.p: This node calculates the distance between two points in nD Euclidean space. The coordinates are contained in 2 columns of numerical lists. The number of dimensions is also returned
This node was developed by Vernalis Research (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: The coordinates of the first point in a List Cell
The coordinates of the second point in a List Cell
Should the node return the squared distance, rather than the distance

ports.outPort: Port with n-D distances and number of dimensions added
